name: Cube Roll (itch) (Daniel Wang)
description:
This is my first game.

It started as a very simple learning project following a youtube Unity tutorial .

Within a month time, once I learned something new, I add it to the game.

Finally I feel it is good enough to be published.

Hope someone will like it.

Key Features:

  • Relaxing Graphics&Music
  • Hidden Secrets
  • World Ranking board
  • Challenging racing and hit combo

Note: All the musics in game are copyright free musics downloaded from Youtube's Audio Library. If you like them, you can find details in game's credit panel.

Please let me know how you feel about this game!
